entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:01 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: N 46 km/h gust 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 70 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
